stories.title: A Better Way to Provision Kubernetes Resources Using Terraform

stories.text:
We host two sites with Netlify and monitor both of them with Pingdom. Over the past two months, we've had a total of 2 hours downtime for different reasons, from bad SSL certificates to total unavailability of the site.

We use AWS Route 53 as our DNS and a static site generator for our site which should make everything very simple.
stories.title: Ask HN: Are you experiencing increased Netlify downtime?

stories.text:
I have a less-but-not-uncommon name, and was able to secure an account with a popular email service with my name. But the experience has been abysmal. There are dozens of instances where different people have used my email address for dating services, banking, receipt of legal documents, the latest SaaS, and so on.

What would you do in this situation?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you handle people using your email to sign up for services?

stories.text:
Sandbox provides Banking as a Service (BaaS) infrastructure for fintechs and banks. We help institutions quickly and securely integrate new software. We are growing quickly, YC backed, and possess an enviable runway. Our team is looking to hire exceptional individuals for the following:

Solution Delivery Engineering Manager (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/06/11/solution-delivery-engineering-manager/) Will lead a team of seasoned and talented engineers that is focused on developing integrations between banking systems for client institutions

Solution Delivery Engineer (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/04/30/solution-delivery-software-engineer/) Will scope requirements, develop, test and deploy specific customer integrations using our Glyue platform

Project Manager (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/07/30/project-manager-remote/) will handle a variety of tasks required to deliver a successful implementation of Sandbox that powers the integration between a fintech’s software and a FI’s systems

Senior Platform Software Engineer (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/04/30/senior-platform-software-engineer/ ) Successful candidates will fulfill the requirements of our Platform Software Engineer role and also possess technical leadership, software architecture design, and devops abilities. A minimum of 4 years of professional experience is required.
stories.title: Sandbox Banking (YC W17) | is Hiring|Remote| HTTPS://sandboxbanking.com/careers/
